special_text:
[i](As this enters, choose an opponent to protect it. You and others can attack it. It gains abilities when it’s at certain defense or below.)[/i]
If one or more counters would be put on a creature you control, twice that many counters are put on that creature instead.
[b]3 Defense[/b] Stage 2
At the beginning of combat on your turn, you may tap target creature.
[b]Defeated[/b] Stage 3
Once per turn, whenever you put one or more counters on a creature, draw a card.
